channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric -- Geo SCADA Mobile
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric -- Geo SCADA Mobile

item.title: CVE-2022-32530|2024-08-03T07:46:43.411Z -- schneider%20electric -- geo%20scada%20mobile
item.description: A CWE-668 Exposure of Resource to Wrong Sphere vulnerability exists that could cause users to be misled, hiding alarms, showing the wrong server connection option or the wrong control request when a mobile device has been compromised by a malicious application. Affected Product: Geo SCADA Mobile (Build 222 and prior)
